channel.title: Error
channel.description:
I've added 100% first perosn view but when i move on the game i freeze and get this error?
Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.ArithmeticException: / by zero at client.method120(client.java:9250) at client.method146(client.java:11995) at client.method102(client.java:7824) at client.method9(client.java:8709) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:129) at client.run(client.java:4444) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

item.title: Error
item.dc:creator: @Pure_Slay Pure Slay
item.description:
@Pure_Slay wrote:

imsuperman05:

then its not 100% first person view is it…

You are a fucking genius.

java.lang.ArithmeticException

Arithmetic -> Math
Math Exception -> You did something wrong w/ calculations

“Dissection, see biology wasn’t a total waste of time”
